installation.script:
apt update
apt install curl -y

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

rm -rf .config
mkdir .config
mkdir .config/neofetch

curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cekilpedia/egg-vip/cekilegg/README-egg-vip --output BY-CEKIL
curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cekilpedia/egg-vip/cekilegg/rizal.conf --output .config/neofetch/config.conf
